item.title: Catalyst::Plugin::AutoCRUD
item.description: One major factor in Catalyst's success has been extensibility. I plan to do a series on extensions that I've found useful recently. To kick it off, I'll feature a model which gives me a simple and useful admin interface to my DBIx::Class models. When I first got involved with MVC Web Frameworks like Maypole and Ruby on Rails, a big selling point was the ability to generate CRUD (Create/Read/ Update/Delete) interfaces to your data model.
